Description.Text: Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 128 accommodation units. Services and facilities at the hotel include internet access, wireless internet access, a restaurant, a dining area, a bar, a conference room and a business centre. Guests travelling in their own vehicles can make use of the available parking spaces. Rooms The establishment offers family rooms and non-smoking rooms. All accommodation units feature air conditioning and a bathroom. In each accommodation unit, guests will find a fridge, tea and coffee making equipment, internet access and wireless internet access. Sports/Entertainment The establishment's leisure facilities include a gym. Meals The establishment offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast and dinner.
